project.description:
Creates a packaged component item. If the package with the same version exists, a new package is not created. If the package is deployed, the deployment step is ignored. Optionally store the package components in GIT and run SonarQube static code analysis on the package
source bin/createPackage.sh

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: componentId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Id of the component to be packaged and deployed if this value is null component name will be used instead.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: processName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the Process to be Packaged

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: packageVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version of the Package to be created

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: componentVersion
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If no value is specified the latest component version will be used to create the package.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: extractComponentXmlFolder
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If this value is set the component XMLs with the package will be extracted. This may take up to 2 minutes to extract all components of the package

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If this value is set the component XML will be stored in GIT. In the ${gitRepoURL} configured.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd ${SCRIPTS_HOME} saveNotes="Triggered by jenkins user ${BUILD_USER_ID} ... ${notes}" source ./bin/createPackage.sh notes="${saveNotes}" echo $packageId
